Description: Verify order schema enforces required fields
Test Steps:
1. Attempt to create order without required fields
2. Verify validation error
3. Check error message
Expected Result:
Validation error thrown
Order not created

Test Steps:
1. Attempt to insert wrong data types
2. Verify type validation
3. Check error handling

Description: Verify only valid status values accepted
Test Steps:
1. Attempt to set invalid status
2. Verify enum validation
3. Check error message
Expected Result:
Enum validation error
Status not updated

Description: Verify default values set on creation
Test Steps:
1. Create order without optional fields
2. Retrieve order
3. Verify default values
Expected Result:
isPaid: false
isDelivered: false
status: Pending

Test Steps:
1. Create new order
2. Retrieve order
3. Check createdAt and updatedAt
Expected Result: createdAt and updatedAt populated with current timestamp

Description: Verify product ObjectId references valid product
Test Steps:
1. Create order with product reference
2. Verify reference valid
3. Check product exists
Expected Result:
Order created successfully
Product reference valid

Test Steps:
1. Attempt order with invalid product ID
2. Verify validation
3. Check error handling
Expected Result: Reference validation error or order created with invalid ref

1. Create order with incomplete items
2. Verify validation
3. Check error message

1. Attempt order with zero/negative quantity
2. Verify validation
3. Check error handling

1. Attempt order with negative price
2. Verify validation
3. Check error handling

1. Create order without address field
2. Verify validation
3. Check error message

1. Create order with very long address
2. Verify handling
3. Check data stored

1. Create order with payment method
2. Retrieve order
3. Verify payment method

1. Update order with payment result
2. Retrieve order
3. Verify all fields present
Expected Result: All fields: id, status, update_time, email_address present

Test Steps:
1. Create order with multiple items
2. Calculate expected itemsPrice
3. Compare with stored value

1. Create order with all prices
2. Calculate expected total
3. Compare with stored value

1. Create order with precise prices
2. Retrieve order
3. Verify precision maintained

1. Create order with user reference
2. Verify reference valid
3. Check user exists
Expected Result: Order created with valid user reference

Test Steps:
1. Query order with populate('user', 'name')
2. Verify user data returned
3. Check name field
Expected Result: User object with name field returned

Description: Verify order persists after user deletion
Test Steps:
1. Delete user
2. Query order
3. Verify order still exists
Expected Result:
Order exists
User reference null or deleted

1. Create multiple orders for one user
2. Query orders by user
3. Verify all returned

1. Create order with multiple products
2. Retrieve order
3. Verify all products referenced

2. Retrieve order

Description: Verify cart deleted on COD delivery
Preconditions:
Database connected
COD order with cart
Test Steps:
1. Mark COD order as Delivered
2. Query cart by user
3. Verify cart deleted

3. Check status unchanged
